      • bounds

        public Bounds bounds()
              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Dataset
        The extent of the dataset in its native coordinate reference system.

        In the event the layer is empty this method should return an null envelope with Envelope.setToNull().

        Specified by:

      • update

        public FeatureWriteCursor update(VectorQuery q)
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: VectorDataset
        Returns an updatable feature cursor for the dataset.

        If the dataset does not support update this method should throw UnsupportedOperationException. Application code can check VectorDriver#supports(Capability).

        Specified by:
        update in interface VectorDataset
        Parameters:
        q - Query used to define the results to be updated.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • append

        public FeatureAppendCursor append(VectorQuery q)
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: VectorDataset
        Returns a feature cursor for appending the dataset.

        If the dataset does not support apend this method should throw UnsupportedOperationException. Application code can check VectorDriver#supports(Capability).

        Specified by:
        append in interface VectorDataset
        Parameters:
        q - Query object.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Disposes the object.

        Unlike Closeable.close() this method does not throw IOException and implementations must ensure no exceptions are thrown from this method.

        Application code must always be sure to call this method on any implementing class. Implementing classes should handle multiple calls to this method.

        Specified by:
        close in interface Disposable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
